heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Discover what Ayahuasca is, its benefits, and how it can help you on your path of healing and self-discovery.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the team of spiritual guides who will accompany you with wisdom and compassion during your experience.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound experience. Access our guides and resources.
contactCommunityText: Follow our social media to stay updated on upcoming ceremonies, events, and exclusive content about healing and spiritual growth. We look forward to seeing you!
footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to continue your journey.
googleSuccessDescription: You have signed in with Google.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your journey.
registerSuccessDescription: We've sent you a verification email.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errorMinLength: The {{field}} must be at least {{count}} characters long.
errorPositiveNumber: The {{field}} must be a positive number.
errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you enter a phone number.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral Amazonian medicine, a sacred brew prepared from the cooking of two plants: the Banisteriopsis caapi vine and the leaves of the Psychotria viridis shrub. Known as the 'vine of the spirits,' it has been used for centuries by indigenous peoples for healing, spiritual, and self-discovery purposes. Its power lies in its ability to open the doors of perception, allowing for deep introspection and connection with the universe.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca acts on a physical, emotional, and spiritual level. The DMT present in the leaves of Psychotria viridis, a potent psychoactive compound, is activated by the MAO inhibitors from the Banisteriopsis caapi vine. This synergy allows the DMT to reach the brain, inducing expanded states of consciousness. During this process, it is common to experience visions, purges (vomiting or diarrhea, considered an energetic cleansing), and profound emotional and spiritual revelations, all within a safe and guided ceremonial space.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a spiritual teacher or a plant intelligence that guides each participant on a unique and personal journey. It reveals what needs to be healed, shows limiting behavior patterns, and helps to reconnect with the purest essence of being. Each ceremony is a sacred conversation with this ancestral wisdom, an opportunity to receive guidance, clarity, and deep healing.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Ayahuasca can dissolve mental confusion, helping to find answers to deep questions and to clarify one's life purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It allows the release of deep-seated traumas, fears, and emotional blockages, promoting profound healing of the heart and soul.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It facilitates a renewed connection with oneself, with others, with nature, and with the universe, fostering a sense of unity and belonging.
groupCeremonyDescription: Our group ceremonies are an opportunity to heal in community, sharing the energy and support of other seekers in a safe and contained environment. The power of the group amplifies the experience, creating a collective healing field where each participant contributes to the journey of others.
privateCeremonyDescription: We offer private ceremonies for those seeking a more intimate and personalized experience. Ideal for individuals, couples, or small groups who wish to work on specific intentions with the focused attention of our guides. It is a space of deep vulnerability and transformation, tailored to your needs.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the dedicated team that will accompany you on your healing journey. Each of our guides brings deep wisdom, compassion, and an unwavering commitment to ancestral medicine.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming and past ceremonies. Each is a unique opportunity for healing and growth.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Proper preparation is the key to a transformative and safe experience. Follow this guide to align your body, mind, and spirit for the journey.
preparationProcessDescription: Understanding the phases of the journey will help you navigate the experience with confidence and openness.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The medicine is shared in a sacred space, guided by songs (icaros) and silence.
experienceProcessDescription: An introspective journey with visions, emotions, and profound revelations.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we help you process and apply the teachings in your daily life.
dietSubtitle: Cleansing your body is essential. We recommend following this diet for at least 3-7 days before the ceremony.
allowedFoodsList:
• Fresh fruits and vegetables
• Whole grains (rice, oats, quinoa)
• Legumes
• Fish and chicken (without strong seasonings)
• Plenty of water
prohibitedFoodsList:
• Red meat and pork
• Spicy or heavily seasoned food
• Fermented foods
• Dairy and aged cheeses
• Sugars and caffeine
• Alcohol and recreational drugs
mentalPrepSubtitle: Prepare your mind and spirit to receive the medicine with respect and openness.
meditationDescription: Dedicate time to silence to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what brings you to the ceremony. What do you wish to heal or understand?
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes before the journey.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca often brings suppressed emotions to the surface to be released. It is a deep cleansing process that can manifest through tears, laughter, or physical catharsis. Trust the process and the guidance of our facilitators to navigate these waters. You are in a safe space to feel and let go.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare for a night of introspection and comfort.
comfortItemsList:
• Comfortable and warm clothing (in layers)
• A blanket and pillow
• A yoga mat
• Water in a reusable container
essentialsList:
• A personal item for your altar (optional)
• A journal and pen for integration
• An open mind and heart

exportDataDescription: Download a backup of all important application data (users, ceremonies, content, etc.) in a JSON file.
importDataDescription: Restore the application from a JSON backup file. This action will overwrite all existing data.
importWarningDescription: You are about to overwrite ALL application data with the contents of this file. This action is irreversible. An automatic backup will be created before proceeding.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before the last import. If something went wrong, you can revert the changes.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been restored to its previous state.
rollbackWarningDescription: Are you sure you want to revert the last import? This will restore the data to the state it was in before you imported the file.
